name: ARSKView
desc: A view that blends virtual 2D content from SpriteKit into the 3D space of an augmented reality experience.

items.name: var session: ARSession
items.desc: The AR session that manages motion tracking and camera image processing for the view's contents.

items.name: var delegate: ARSKViewDelegate?
items.desc: An object you provide to mediate synchronization of the view's AR scene information with SpriteKit content.

items.name: protocol ARSKViewDelegate
items.desc: Methods you can implement to mediate the automatic synchronization of SpriteKit content with an AR session.

items.name: func anchor(for: SKNode) -> ARAnchor?
items.desc: Returns the AR anchor associated with the specified SpriteKit node, if any.

items.name: func node(for: ARAnchor) -> SKNode?
items.desc: Returns the SpriteKit node associated with the specified AR anchor, if any.
